name: Spattle Cats
detailed_description:
Space Cats In Steam Punk Ships Battling?


That's right! Welcome to Spattle Cats, an action packed fun filled physics game. Take control of your spattle ship and use momentum, timing, and reflexes to pound the friskiness out of the enemy Spattle Cats. Looking for more power more Spattle? Crush your enemies collect their gold and purchase new ships and new weapon arms for your Spattle Cat destroyer. Bounce through endless levels of fun and see how far you can go and show the universe how tough your Spattle Cat is.

FEATURES

Physics Based Gameplay
Simple Controls
Endless Levels
Upgrade Your Spattle Ship
Upgrade Your Spattle Weapons
High Replay Value

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
